text:
Please @BorisJohnson read this 🙏 We need stringent measures, effective systems & a proper plan. Lockdowns are pointless when there are no border controls. Especially with #mutant strains that threaten our #vaccine.
#CloseTheBordersNow #COVID19 #Covid19UK #UKlockdown #covid #uk https://t.co/kdLKAc7MQd
